metadata.description: Additional information associated with the coupon.

times_redeemed.description: Number of times the coupon has been redeemed.

livemode.description: Indicates if the coupon is in live mode.

object.description: Type of object, in this case, 'coupon'.

redeem_by.description: Timestamp by which the coupon must be redeemed.

duration.description: Specifies the duration that the coupon remains valid for, e.g., once, repeating.

valid.description: Indicates if the coupon is currently valid for use.

duration_in_months.description: The number of months the coupon is valid for.

name.description: Name of the coupon for identification purposes.

max_redemptions.description: Maximum number of times the coupon can be redeemed.

amount_off.description: The amount deducted from the total cost when the coupon is applied.

created.description: Timestamp when the coupon was created.

updated.description: Timestamp when the coupon was last updated.

percent_off.description: Percentage discount applied when coupon is used.

is_deleted.description: Indicates if the coupon has been marked as deleted.
